dmca.title: Copyright Infringement.
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 3:13:52 p.m.
(GMT-6) on October 27, 2006.

 

Legal Response Team

 


________________________________

From: LadyCibelle [mailto:editing@nb.sympatico.ca] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 10:54 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Copyright Infringement.
Subject: Copyright Infringement.



A user of The Planet is posting stolen stories on six different
websites. He or she has copied my stories, "Pop Goes The Weasel Ch. 01"
without my permission.

The originals are located on Literotica.com: 
http://english.literotica.com/stories/showstory.php?id=218874


The stolen versions are here: 
http://xxlpenis.com/2006/10/20/pop_goes_the_weasel_ch_01/



I hereby assert that my name is Chantal Rioux AKA LadyCibelle, that I am
the author and sole legal owner of these stories, and that the 'The
Planet' user running the website "xxlpenis.com" has committed an offense
against the Section 501 of the United States Copyright Act and "the
infringement may also constitute a criminal misdemeanor or felony, which
would be prosecuted by the U.S. Department of Justice."

I expect immediate attention to this matter. You have 2 business days to
respond before I bring this to the attention of my attorney.

 

 



LadyCibelle

editing@nb.sympatico.ca
